titles: The apprentices lamentation together, vvith a dolefull elegie upon the manner of the death of that worthy, and valorous Knight Sr. Richard Wiseman.
author: P.W.
notes: Verse - "Thus died the mirrour of the times;".
Place of publication and publication date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Wiseman, Richard, --  Sir, d. 1642 --  Early works to 1800.
